body: Caught my #dog trying to 'help' with the #laundry this morning! #doglife #pets

comments.body: Haha, this is hilarious! Looks like they’re really into 'helping.' Did they actually get anything folded?
@67676 Not even close! More like unfolding everything I had just folded.
This is adorable! What kind of dog do you have?
@78787 Thanks! She’s a golden retriever—always full of energy and always 'helping' where she can!
The way she’s wagging her tail like she’s doing a great job is the best part. Does she do this often?
@89898 Haha, yes! Any time laundry is involved, she’s right there pulling socks out of the basket.
My dog does the same thing! They think they’re being so helpful. Have you trained her to actually bring you things?
@23232 I’ve tried, but she gets too distracted and just ends up chewing on whatever she’s supposed to bring me.
This made my day! Does she have any other 'chores' she likes to 'help' with?
@34343 Haha, she loves to 'help' with the vacuuming too—by barking at it the whole time!
